metadata.name: SOLA-STAR #1 (SN659-2h)
metadata.description:
[Website](https://thesolaverse.com) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/the_solaverse) | [Discord](https://discord.gg/solaverse)

A genesis collection of 2,000 NFTs stored on the Ethereum blockchain. SOLA-STARS represent the foundation for the upcoming metaverse - The SolaVerse - and provide the starting point for all future projects and games built within it. SOLA-STAR NFT holders will also be able to participate in exclusive events, airdrops and physical merch drops. Join us on this journey in creating, building and expanding The SolaVerse - Visit [thesolaverse.com](https://thesolaverse.com) to get started.
